DOC.brief_summary: A handheld digital colposcope utilizes flurorescent light test rapid detection management cervical lesion . The handheld research device capture cervical image fluorescent light show region cervical tissue autofluoresce . The investigator study relationship level fluorescence sample tissue ( biopsy ) obtain patient part routine care . The investigator also compare efficacy hand hold device data collect research device test team , i.e . multispectral digital colposcopes .

DOC.criteria: Women least 18 year old Women pregnant confirm urine test Women breastfeed Women understand study procedure provide write informed consent Women meet inclusion criterion Women hysterectomy
